caption.p: Morphological transition of C. albincans in presence of subinhibitory concentrations of Piper caldense C.D.C. essential oil; Micrography was performed through 40X objective optical microscopy; photographic image captured in digital camera with 4X zoom and resized for better computer resolution. Growth control ( A); P.caldense essential oil at 128 µg/mL ( B); 256 µg/mL ( C) and 512 µg/mL
